dream: I find myself in a room. There is my ex-boyfriend John and his new girlfriend. We are all sitting in a chair separately. Uneasy atmosphere. There is a basket that contains an apple. I get up from the chair and eat the apple. Somehow eating the apple allows me to leave the room.
interpretation:
This dream may symbolize unresolved feelings or emotions associated with your past relationship with John. The presence of John and his new girlfriend suggests that you may still be processing the fact that he has moved on. The uneasy atmosphere indicates that there may be lingering discomfort or tension surrounding the breakup.

The basket with the apple can symbolize temptation or a desire for knowledge. By eating the apple, you are taking control and asserting your own agency in the situation. This action allows you to leave the room, which could symbolize a sense of freedom or liberation from the emotional constraints associated with the past.

Overall, this dream may suggest that you are in the process of healing and moving on from the past. It signifies your willingness to let go and embrace your own personal growth.
title: "The Forbidden Apple: Escaping the Unsettling Encounter with John and His New Flame"
